long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Next Shorts: Enjoy a hands-free YouTube Shorts experience! With this extension, you no longer need to click 'Next' when a short video ends—your viewing continues automatically. Stay in the flow as each video seamlessly transitions to the next, without interruption. Perfect for discovering more content with zero effort!
